name: Nobi's Vision
description:
Infancy is a stage with such wonderful imagination... and just as dark as night.

Mind can be your safest refugee... or your worst nightmare.

All kinds of issues influence and troubles young Nobi's mind.

Controls:

- A and D: Left and Right (works with arrows too)

- W: Jump (Up Arrow too)

- Space: Change background and music style for non-playable leves (1 and 3).

- P: Go to next level
